product.title: Pure Black & Ebony Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
product.description: Dramatic, but so very reserved too, this combination of matt black wooden slat and black tape is a rich and sophisticated look. Wooden blinds are lovely to look as well as being practical. During the day youre able to create perfect levels of shading and privacy while at ni dramatic, but so very reserved too, this combination of matt black wooden slat and black tape is a rich and sophisticated look.

relproducts.title: Rimini Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. relproducts.title: Genesis Black Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their oslo blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Onyx Black
relproducts.description: Stirloonyx black plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in black is simplicity at its best; the combination of the delicately textured blackout fabric with the classic and cool black hue makes this blind functional, stylish, and striking. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This jet black venetian blind adds a bold black shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wooden accessories for a chic finished look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

relproducts.title: Richmond Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

relproducts.title: Decor Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

relproducts.title: Henderson Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

relproducts.title: Rochester Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

relproducts.title: Roma Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

relproducts.title: Amor Icing Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The amor pure is the next shade up from the amor snowfall in terms of whiteness. In keeping with its name, the amor pure is that slightly off-white colour of paper or fluffy white cloud. All blinds in the amor range are 100% blackout so they are perfect for blocking out the light in a bedroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This white gloss blind will add a stylish, fresh and crisp feel in any room in your home, the gloss finish adds an extra touch of chic.
